thread.title: Police nab 2 after shots fired outside Forest Hills T stop
thread.title_full: Police nab 2 after shots fired outside Forest Hills T stop | Boston Herald

author: O'Ryan Johnson
title: Police nab 2 after shots fired outside Forest Hills T stop
text:
Boston police have arrested two and recovered a firearm after shots were fired outside of Forest Hills MBTA station, police said.
Officer Rachel McGuire, spokeswoman for the Boston Police Department, said the call came in about 7:50 AM for shots fired and ballistic evidence was recovered at the scene.
There were no reports of any injuries.
The shooting caused delays on the Orange Line for about 30 minutes during the busy morning rush-hour commute.
Anyone with information is urged to call police. Information can also be provided anonymously to 800-494 -TIPS.
